issue.title: Principal Wilson's Approval Rating
issue.text: Principal Wilson thinks homework is really important. You will find that if you grade your students' homework correctly, your approval rating will go up!

issue.title: Student Respect Score
issue.text: Some of your students can be disrespectful to you and their fellow students. To help them learn to behave properly in school, be sure to look at their 'behavior reports' and choose the best way to deal with each situation.

issue.title: Student Smarts Score
issue.text: As you teach lessons and grade homeworks, your students will gradually get smarter if you do a good job! The better you do, the smarter they get!

issue.title: Teaching Points
issue.text: For every lesson you teach, you receive 'Teaching Points'. The better you do on the lesson, the more teaching points you earn. Once you have enough teaching points, you can move up to teach the next grade level!

issue.title: School Store Credit
issue.text: For every lesson you teach, you receive 'Store Credit'. The better you do on the lesson, the more store credit you earn. When you have enough store credits, you can trade your store credits for activities that you can access in your classroom's 'Fun Zone'.

issue.title: Chapter Secrets
issue.text: As you read, look for words that stand out in the text. Tap them to find new facts and pictures!
